fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP 1D, G/F., NEWMAN HOUSE, NOS. 35-45 JOHNSTON ROAD, WAN CHAI, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港灣仔莊士敦道35-45號利文樓地下1D鋪

geocode_en.formatted_address: G/F, Newman House, 35-45 Johnston Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: G/F, Newman House, 35-45 Johnston Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: G/F, Newman House, 35-45 Johnston Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: Le Bistro Winebeast Restaurant & Wine Shop

reviews.text: Relatively affordable French style fine dining in a setting that's refined, but not pretentious and uncomfortable. Highly recommend the wine pairing tasting menu which changes seasonally. Service is friendly and efficient. A personal favourite. Although the new location is a little cramped and has less personal space (especially so on Valentine's week), I still think that this is a great place to dine.
Excellent French cuisine by chef Johan Ducroquet, at surprisingly reasonable price. The duck confit, buratta cheese and bavette steak are highly recommended.
Food and wine are really good. Price is reasonable for french dining.
I come for the duck confit and it's amazing dish! The lunch set is great!
Love this place. Chef also understands good vegetarian food and that’s a plus-plus. Attentive service

result.formatted_address: G/F, Newman House, 35-45 Johnston Rd, Wan Chai, 香港
result.name: Le Bistro Winebeast Restaurant & Wine Shop

reviews.text:
とってもおいしいフレンチをリーズナブルな値段で食べられます。
ガスパチョのスープはキャビアがたくさん乗っていてとても美味しかったです。
ランチは予約必須です。テーブル席とカウンター席があるので、予約のときにきちんと確かめておくことをおすすめします。
因為我只是经過未有內進過所以不能夠評論對不起。

一間有水準的法國小店，店內環境舒適，食物非常有水準。
不是每次食法國餐都要浪漫到一個點的😁
如果想輕鬆食餐有水準有誠意嘅法國菜，這間是個好選擇
評級。。。會再去 😗

Relatively affordable French style fine dining in a setting that's refined, but not pretentious and uncomfortable. Highly recommend the wine pairing tasting menu which changes seasonally. Service is friendly and efficient. A personal favourite. Although the new location is a little cramped and has less personal space (especially so on Valentine's week), I still think that this is a great place to dine.

너무 짰어요...
와인 리스트도 좋고 메뉴구성도 좋지만

간이 너무 쎄요
